overview: Goodbye Darling is one day in the enduring love story of Irish Volunteer Michael Joseph Oâ€™Rahilly and his wife Nancy. It is day five of the 1916 Rising, and as the fighting intensifies, a concerned Nancy seeks comfort and diversion by playing the piano, unaware that her husband is leaving the beleaguered G.P.O. to lead the charge that will ultimately claim his life.
title: Goodbye Darling
